metadata.name: Enterprise Architecture Ontology
metadata.description: Enterprise Architecture ontology for strategic transformation planning, portfolio management, and value realisation
metadata.creator: BAIV Platform Team

entities.name: Portfolio
entities.description: Collection of programmes delivering strategic vision within an investment envelope over a defined time horizon

entities.name: Programme
entities.description: Coherent set of initiatives delivering programme benefits aligned to a strategic pillar within a portfolio

entities.name: Initiative
entities.description: Discrete transformation initiative with defined outcomes, dependencies, and value contribution within a programme

entities.name: Dependency
entities.description: Typed relationship between initiatives defining sequencing, enablement, and blocking constraints

entities.name: Milestone
entities.description: Significant achievement point within an initiative marking key deliverables or gates

oaa:properties.name: isGate
oaa:properties.description: Whether this is a governance gate

entities.name: PracticeArea
entities.description: Business unit or advisory practice contributing to and benefiting from transformation initiatives

entities.name: StrategicPillar
entities.description: Major strategic theme or capability area that groups related programmes and defines contribution to vision

entities.name: BenefitMetric
entities.description: Quantified benefit measurement with baseline, target, and actual values for tracking value realisation

entities.name: Risk
entities.description: Identified risk to initiative or programme delivery with probability, impact, and mitigation tracking

relationships.name: hasProgramme
relationships.description: Portfolio contains one or more programmes delivering its strategic objectives

relationships.name: belongsToPortfolio
relationships.description: Programme is contained within and governed by a portfolio

relationships.name: hasInitiative
relationships.description: Programme contains one or more initiatives that deliver its benefits

relationships.name: belongsToProgramme
relationships.description: Initiative is executed within the scope of a programme

relationships.name: hasDependency
relationships.description: Initiative has dependencies on other initiatives for sequencing

relationships.name: dependsOnInitiative
relationships.description: Dependency links to the predecessor initiative that must complete or start first

relationships.name: hasMilestone
relationships.description: Initiative includes milestones marking key achievements and gates

relationships.name: milestoneOf
relationships.description: Milestone belongs to a specific initiative for tracking

relationships.name: benefitsPracticeArea
relationships.description: Initiative delivers benefits to a specific practice area

relationships.name: receivesInitiativeBenefits
relationships.description: Practice area receives value from initiatives that target it

relationships.name: alignsToStrategicPillar
relationships.description: Programme aligns to and contributes to a strategic pillar

relationships.name: hasProgrammes
relationships.description: Strategic pillar is delivered through aligned programmes

relationships.name: tracksBenefit
relationships.description: Initiative or programme tracks specific benefit metrics

relationships.name: benefitTrackedBy
relationships.description: Benefit metric is tracked by an initiative or programme

relationships.name: hasRisk
relationships.description: Initiative has identified risks that may impact delivery

relationships.name: riskOf
relationships.description: Risk is associated with a specific initiative

businessRules.name: Portfolio Must Have Programmes
businessRules.description: Every portfolio must contain at least one programme to be valid
businessRules.constraint: THEN it MUST have at least one Programme linked via hasProgramme relationship

businessRules.name: Programme Must Belong To Portfolio
businessRules.description: Every programme must be owned by exactly one portfolio
businessRules.constraint: THEN it MUST have exactly one belongsToPortfolio relationship to a valid Portfolio

businessRules.name: Initiative Must Belong To Programme
businessRules.description: Every initiative must be executed within a programme context
businessRules.constraint: THEN it MUST have exactly one belongsToProgramme relationship to a valid Programme

businessRules.name: No Circular Dependencies
businessRules.description: Initiative dependency chains must not form cycles
businessRules.condition: IF Initiative A depends on Initiative B
businessRules.constraint: THEN Initiative B MUST NOT have a dependency chain that leads back to Initiative A

businessRules.name: Critical Path Dependencies Must Have Dates
businessRules.description: Dependencies marked as critical path require date information
businessRules.constraint: THEN the related Initiatives MUST have startDate and endDate defined

businessRules.name: Completed Initiatives Cannot Have Open Milestones
businessRules.description: When initiative completes, all milestones should be closed
businessRules.constraint: THEN all related Milestones MUST have status of 'completed' or 'cancelled'

businessRules.name: High Impact Risks Require Mitigation
businessRules.description: Significant risks must have mitigation strategies defined
businessRules.condition: IF Risk.impact equals 'high' AND Risk.status equals 'open'
businessRules.constraint: THEN Risk MUST have mitigation property defined with non-empty value

businessRules.name: Contribution Weights Must Sum To One
businessRules.description: Strategic pillar contribution weights should total to 1.0
businessRules.condition: IF Portfolio has multiple StrategicPillars via Programmes
businessRules.constraint: THEN the sum of all StrategicPillar.contributionWeight values MUST equal 1.0 (Â±0.01 tolerance)
